class.name: OScriptNodeSceneTree
class.brief_description: Returns a reference to the top-level [SceneTree].
class.description: The [OScriptNodeSceneTree] returns a reference to the top-level [SceneTree]. The [SceneTree] instance is useful for creating various scene-specific objects such as [Timer]s or [Tween]s. If your orchestration base type extends [Node], you can also directly access the [SceneTree] using the [method Node.get_tree] method.
